action.text: SA 1958 fell when SA 1934 (Division II) was tabled.
Amendment SA 1958 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1934 (Division II). (consideration: CR S8571-8572; text: CR S8571) To change the enactment date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1958 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1934 (Division II).
